former Republican presidential candidate hit back yesterday over unflattering comments made by Mr Donald Rumsfeld in his new autobiography, Known and Unknown. Reviving a feud between the pair, Mr Donald Rumsfeld describes John McCain in his book as a man with a hair-trigger temper and a propensity to fashion and shift his positions to appeal to the media .
